snippet.title: Welcome to Brightville - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Get your first look at Welcome to Brightville in this exclusive reveal trailer for the upcoming immersive sim, where magic powers machinery and every choice matters. 

You play as an automaton unaffected by the influence of the AI that took over the city of Brightville. Navigate a dark world where magic and technology collide, experiment with magic abilities, interact with eccentric characters, and adapt to a hostile environment full of magic hazards and vicious sentient robots. 

Welcome to Brightville is coming 2027 to consoles and PC via Steam.
